desc: We are an organic herb farm in Delaware that sells wholesale organic herbs and edible flowers. We sell organic hydrosols made from fresh herbs like mint, rosemary, thyme, lavender, basil, lemon verbena, sage, and more.

layout.text: Spring Thyme Herb Farm is a USDA Certified Organic grower and processor of wholesale herbs, edible flowers, and assorted greens. As of now, we don't sell herbs or edible flowers online.
